mapper.select: select * from TodoList where islive = 1 ORDER BY todo_num ASC

select todo.todo_num, todo.member_num, todo.todo_title, todo.todo_description, todo.todo_startDate, todo.todo_endDate, todo.islive from todolist todo, member m, team t where todo.member_num = m.member_num and m.team_num = t.team_num and todo.islive = 1 and m.member_num = #{member_num} and t.team_num = #{team_num} order by todo.todo_num asc
mapper.update: update todoList set islive = 0 where todo_num = #{todo_num}
